perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, the parties hereto desire to further amend the Agreement to modify the provisions of the Agreement regarding [***] of the term thereof; and

WHEREAS, the parties hereto desire to set forth herein the terms and conditions of their agreements and understandings with respect to the foregoing.
perturbation.changed_text: WHEREAS, the parties hereto desire to set forth herein the terms and conditions of their agreements and understandings with respect to the foregoing.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the explicit mention of modifying the provisions regarding '[***]' (presumably a key term duration, payment or intellectual property rights), the agreement becomes ambiguous. Later sections might refer to changes regarding '[***]' without a clear foundation, creating uncertainty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text:
2. The text of Section 2. A. and B. of the Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and the following language is inserted in its stead:

[***]
perturbation.changed_text: 2. The text of Section 2. A. and B. of the Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and the following language is inserted in its stead:
perturbation.explanation: By deleting the inserted language '[***]' and leaving Section 2.A and 2.B of the original agreement effectively blank, the amendment contradicts later clauses that may depend on the content that was originally meant to be inserted. This removal makes it impossible to understand the updated terms of the agreement as referenced later and creating uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: 3. To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, such provision of this Second Amendment shall prevail and govern for all purposes and in all respects.
perturbation.changed_text: 3. To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, such provision of this Second Amendment shall prevail and govern for all purposes and in all respects. Except for Section 2.A and B.
perturbation.explanation: By explicitly exempting Section 2.A and B from prevailing over conflicting provisions, and Section 2.A and B have been changed to empty string, the agreement creates a direct contradiction. The text says that 'this Second Amendment shall prevail' but also 'Except for Section 2.A and B' which leads to confusion. This ambiguity opens the door to disputes about which version of the agreement is to be used as a base.
